definitions.definition: A new development ; a fresh approach to something; a new way of dealing with a problem .
The ability to act first or on one's own.
An issue to be voted on, brought to the ballot by a sufficient number of signatures from among the voting public .

secondary_definitions: A new development ; a fresh approach to something; a new way of dealing with a problem .
The ability to act first or on one's own.
( politics ) An issue to be voted on, brought to the ballot by a sufficient number of signatures from among the voting public .
